titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on Desmodur E 14.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 7/21/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2008, the duty on a specific linear aromatic polyurethane prepolymer based on toluene diisocyanate (Desmodur E 14).
